General.Name: Tecnisa S.A
General.Description: Tecnisa S.A., together with its subsidiaries, develops and constructs residential and commercial real estate properties in Brazil. The company was formerly known as Tecnisa Engenharia. Tecnisa S.A. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Nicolas Boer, 399, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01142-000
